mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product ( productNum , productName, brand , content, price, viewCount, regdate, saveFileName, fileSize) VALUES ( product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{brand}, #{content}, #{price}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT productNum,productName,brand,content,price,, saveFileName, LAG(productNum, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY productNum DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(productNum, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY productNum DESC) AS nextNum FROM product ORDER BY productNum DESC) result1 WHERE productNum=#{productNum}
